short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your streaming experience, detects playlists, subtitles, and file formats in different streaming protocols.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing a cutting-edge streaming analysis tool designed to enhance your media experience. This powerful tool detects playlists, subtitles, and a variety of file formats used in different streaming protocols such as HLS, DASH, HDS, and MSS. It goes beyond the standard capabilities by identifying custom file extensions and analyzing Content-Type headers. With this advanced solution, you can efficiently organize your content, access subtitles, and seamlessly integrate it into your existing workflows. Elevate your streaming experience with this exceptional tool, offering unparalleled convenience and versatility.
